formElement.label: Klocwork root:
formElement.documentation: Root directory on which Klocwork's files are stored, otherwise default will be assumed

formElement.label: Kwinject shell script:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to the script (in case you build with a shell script)

formElement.label: Extra commands:
formElement.documentation: Commands to be entered when executing kwinject.

formElement.label: Output file:
formElement.documentation: Writes the build specification to file. By default, the build specification is written to kwinject.out in the current working directory. This option cannot be used with the --trace-out option.
